lines.text: Maybe... someone killed him with a loop of wire!
Well, if the end was sharp enough, they could stab it through him...
...and then pulling it through the other side would open up the wound!
You're proposin' someone stabbed him hard enough with balin' wire to go clean through?
Yeah! And- and that's part of why they lit the fire, too!
If they burned off the blood and put the wire in the ash after, no one would suspect it was a murder weapon!
I'm... just not seein' that kind of attack workin' out.
The ends of a loop of balin' wire ain't that sharp, and it's not sturdy enough to stab.
You'd have an easier time tryin' to strangle him, really.
